properties.name: downloads.path
properties.description: Where the created CSV files that are requested for download are stored.

properties.name: settings.ui.length
properties.description: UI Setting: Default value for the length of the generated serial number.

properties.name: settings.ui.numeric
properties.description: UI Setting: True if numbers are used for generating serial number.

properties.name: settings.ui.uppercase
properties.description: UI Setting: True if uppercase letters are used for generating serial number.

properties.name: settings.ui.lowercase
properties.description: UI Setting: True if lowercase letters are used for generating serial number.

properties.name: settings.ui.excluded-chars
properties.description: UI Setting: Characters that should not be used for generating serial number.

properties.name: settings.ui.selected-chars
properties.description: UI Setting: Characters that are used for generating serial number.

properties.name: settings.ui.min-quantity
properties.description: UI Setting: Minimum allowed serial numbers set size.

properties.name: settings.ui.max-quantity
properties.description: UI Setting: Maximum allowed serial numbers set size.

properties.name: settings.ui.default-length
properties.description: UI Setting: Default value for the length of the generated serial number.

properties.name: settings.ui.min-length
properties.description: UI Setting: Minimum allowed length of the generated serial number.

properties.name: settings.ui.max-length
properties.description: UI Setting: Maximum allowed length of the generated serial number.
